name: RunSingleSqlScript
description: Allows you to run SQL Scripts
author: Andrew Lackenby

inputs.name: serverName
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instance name of the SQL Server. Separate Multiple servers with a comma. Non standard ports should be specifed as server:port

inputs.name: databaseName
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Separate multiple databases with a comma.

inputs.name: removeComments
inputs.label: Remove comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: If comments are not removed the keyword Go cannot appear in them otherwise the task will fail.

inputs.name: SQLparameters
inputs.label: Replacement Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Usage existingtext=newtext (Example <TableName>=Customer). Comma delimit for multiples

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: SQL Server Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Login using SQL Authentication. Otherwise uses the login the build agent service runs under.

inputs.name: userPassword
inputs.label: SQL Server Authentication password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for SQL Authenication. You should use a secret variable here.
